    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Nestle struggles to get out of the woods]]></title>
      <link>http://www.business-standard.com/article/companies/nestle-still-not-out-of-noodle-woodsnet-profit-and-sales-in-march-quarter-both-continue-sequential-improvement-since-maggi-ban-lifted-but-well-down-on-a-year-before-cmd-promises-more-progress-new-launches-116051200800_1.html</link>
      <guid>http://www.business-standard.com/article/companies/nestle-still-not-out-of-noodle-woodsnet-profit-and-sales-in-march-quarter-both-continue-sequential-improvement-since-maggi-ban-lifted-but-well-down-on-a-year-before-cmd-promises-more-progress-new-launches-116051200800_1.html</guid>
      <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 00:47:00 +0530</pubDate>
      <imageThumb><![CDATA[]]></imageThumb>
      <description><![CDATA[Net profit and sales in March quarter both continue sequential improvement since Maggi ban lifted but well down on annual basis; CMD promises more progress]]></description>
